findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The transfer function does not follow ERC-20 specification and may cause issues if not handled properly.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `BridgeAssist` smart contract, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations (e.g., configure various system parameters and assign other roles, pause the contract). Also there is a privileged `relayer` account that can submit the transaction.
findings.function: pause(), unpause(), addToken(), setDev(), setRelayer(), submitTransaction()
